pageContext.description: Slight flanges & stop ridge. A slight rib down middle of the blade on each side. Back hollowed. Roughly cast
pageContext.other: 3 cross section drawings of palstave on reverse.,Shield device below stop with midrib connected to stop running over shield and continuing a little more than halfway down face of blade.,Butt distinctly notched.
pageContext.associations: 1-27,2 Fragments swords,1 Palstave,3 Winged Celts,15 Socketed Celts,1 Bracelet,6 Cakes Copper,3 Fragments Pottery.
pageContext.publications: Described by C.H. Read in Proc. Soc. Ant. 1892 XIV
pageContext.collection: British Museum,92-6-13-3,Presented by A.W. Franks Esq.,13/6/1892,W? French
